title: NBA referees, playoffs, Jimmy Butler, and NFL team ratings
itunes:title: NBA referees, playoffs, Jimmy Butler, and NFL team ratings
description:
Colin explains why the Houston Rockets have crossed the line and should be fined, why NBA games are officiated differently in the playoffs, why Philadelphia 76ers F Jimmy Butler is so important, and his NFL team ratings in three words. Guests include Chris Broussard, Lance Zierlein, Kendrick Perkins, and Jim Jackson.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
